column5: Hello viewers ! Welcome to Houston !  Here is a stay just 10 mins from downtown and 20 mins from the NRG stadium . 15 mins from Bush IAH Airport.  Adjacent to 59 N/S , 610 E/W & i10 E/W. 8.9 miles (19 min drive) to the Discovery Green Park.  Offering 2 bedrooms (accommodate 4-6) , garage , privacy, 1 bathroom and extra space for entertainment during your stay .  Older home with a Texas southern hospitality.  WiFi connection. Central air/heat.  Washer/dryer.  No smoking.  No pets.
